inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing

inclusion.criterion: targeted tumor(s) accessible to ExAblate device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain score ≥ 4 at the targeted tumors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: targeted tumor-bone interface > 1cm from skin, major nerve or hollow viscera
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: non-tender and attached to the underlying bone

exclusion.criterion: surgical stabilization of affected weight bearing bony structure
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: targeted tumor at impending fracture site of weigh bearing bone

exclusion.criterion: surgical stabilization of tumor site with metallic hardware
